header.title: Become an owner in Montpellier and its surroundings.

management.title: Support for your projects from sales to
management.text1: If we consider the overall increase in rents and the simultaneous fall in mortgage rates, investing in the acquisition of real estate becomes a relevant way to build up secure and sustainable capital.
management.text2: Becoming an owner means building a transferable heritage, being able to benefit from added value and being able to dispose of your property to develop it in accordance with the imposed standards.
management.text3: Aktif transac supports you in the search for goods (calculation of profitability), going to the notary, drafting of the management mandate, search and implementation of a solvent tenant (unpaid rent insurance).

agency.title: An agency on a
agency.span: human scale and at your service.
agency.text1: With more than 1500 satisfied customers since 2008.
agency.text2: The real estate hunter service is aimed at both buyers and sellers wishing to optimize their time and benefit from personalized professional support in the context of a purchase or sale of real estate. 'to people not on site to carry out research or sales.

alert.title: Be reactive by subscribing to the immo alert.

subtitle.1: Find every day in your e-mail box all the new real estate advertisements by creating your e-mail alert!
subtitle.2: To cancel your alert, a simple click on the link at the bottom of the alerts received is enough.
subtitle.3: The E-mail alert is a free service without obligation on your part.

rgpd.text: I agree to the processing of my personal data in accordance with the GDPR.

1.title: about our agency
1.subtitle: A human and responsive agency at your service for any real estate need.

text.1: Aktif transac is an agency on a human scale and attached to the quality of the service provided.
text.2: Specialized in transaction, rental and rental management, we put all our experience of more than 15 years of the real estate agent's profession. We bring you legal, technical and property advice, as well as own insurance and financial guarantees for help you achieve your projects.

2.title: A winning duo for over 15 years.

contact.title: Contact form
contact.name: What is your first and last name?
contact.error: Please enter at least one name and one email address !

rgpd.title: In accordance with Regulation (EU) No. 2016/679 of April 27, 2016 in force from its application on May 25, 2018 (RGPD), we invite you:
rgpd.1: 1. To be aware of our data protection policy.
rgpd.2: 2. To accept it in order to consult and benefit from all the services of our website and our company.
rgpd.btn1: Scroll down to know our policy and enter the site
rgpd.btn2: I have read and accept your data protection policy.
